title: Pessimism and Hope: A Survey of the Financial Status and Aspirations of Black Americans
summary: This report supported by the Citi Foundation aims to better understand the financial status and aspirations of Black Americans and perceived barriers.
tag-1: Pessimism and Hope: A Survey of the Financial Status and Aspirations of Black Americans
